amendment.description: Amendments en bloc expand the provisions of the bill requiring Federal agencies to prepare an analysis of regulations to also require an analysis for any proposed regulation that may result in the elimination of 10,000 jobs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of two amendments, offered en bloc, to expand the provisions of the bill requiring federal agencies to prepare an analysis of regulations which may result in costs of $100 million or more. The amendment would also require the federal agencies to prepare an analysis for any proposed regulation that may result in the elimination of 10,000 jobs.

action.text: On agreeing to the Hayes amendments (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.
